details.sectionContent: Capturing your imagination and taking it to the new level to discover your goal. Capture the situation around you, make it feel lively and take leap.
Seminar will be conducted.The knowledge on photography and vlogging will be presented.

The participants have to click photos according to the theme.
Example: Weather,food,lighting
Participants have to click 9-10  photos of the decoration at the event. In which in every photo should contain at least one participant of the group.

Participants have to shoot a 3-4 min. of vlog describing and capturing the atmosphere of Prakarsh and give it an eye catchy title also they are required to use some of the special effects which would be specified at the time of event.
